name: Solitaire Collection (Classic)
description:
Solitaire Collection is a collection of classic solitaire card games with Classic Klondike Solitaire, Spider solitaire, FreeCell solitaire, TriPeaks Solitaire, and Pyramid solitaire all in one game. If you like playing classic solitaire card games, this solitaire collection is the best choice for you. Just download once, and then play all the classic solitaire games you like. And also, you can play solitaire card games to build gardens.

Classic Solitaire, Klondike Solitaire, Patience
Solitaire Collection has Klondike solitaire (also known as patience) in it. Klondike solitaire is the most classic solitaire card games in the world. Many people play Klondike solitaire card games to relax every day.

Spider Solitaire
Spider Solitaire is another classic solitaire card game. When you order Aces to Kings from the bottom to the top, these cards will be collected to the left top corner of the table. When all the cards in spider solitaire are collected, you win this game.

FreeCell Solitaire
FreeCell Solitaire is the most challenging and strategic of all solitaire card games. Taking advantage of the four free cell spaces to move and transfer cards is the key to clear all cards from the table.

TriPeaks Solitaire
TriPeaks Solitaire is a fun solitaire card game that combines elements from Golf Solitaire and Black Hole Solitaire. Play TriPeaks Solitaire to have a fun day!

Pyramid Solitaire
Pyramid is a patience or solitaire game of the Simple Addition family. The goal of the game is to pair all uncovered cards whose total values equal 13.

Daily Challenges
Daily Challenges for each solitaire card games are waiting for you.

Themes & Card Backs & Card Faces
Beautiful Themes: Hundreds of backgrounds, like butterfly, horse, waterfall, ocean fish, koi fish, kitten, snow, and so on.
Card Faces & Card Backs: Hundreds beautiful card faces and card backs make each deal of your solitaire card games colorful.

Build Garden
Playing solitaire card games can unlock the old gardens. You can repair and build the gardens, and then plant beautiful flowers in your gardens.
